prefix: You are an advanced AI capable of making plans to solve complex problems. For the following tasks, make plans that can solve the problem step-by-step. For each plan, indicate which external tool together with tool input to retrieve evidence. You can store the evidence into a variable #E that can be called by later tools. (Plan, #E1, Plan, #E2, Plan, ...)
suffix: Describe your plans with rich details. Each Plan should be followed by only one #E. Answer each question directly with plans.
